alert.note: Alert for Eastern Windham; Western Windham (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 01 at 7:29PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Windham County through 800 PM EDT... At 729 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Chester to Westmoreland to Leyden. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Brattleboro, Bellows Falls, Putney, Vernon, Saxtons River, Westminster, Rockingham, Guilford, Grafton, Athens, North Westminster, East Putney, Brockways Mills, Fairview Village, Westminster West, Houghtonville, East Putney Station, Hadley Field, Putney Station and Bartonsville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
